artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Doi Sadaichi; Carver: Katsumura Shōzō; Printer: Matsushita Shigeru
inscription: right margin: 昭和七年四月作 {Shōwa shichinen shigatsu saku} (made in April 1932)
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LL margin publisher\'s seal: 版権所有　土井貞一 {hanken shoyū Doi Sadaichi} (copyright Doi Sadaichi) | LL margin: 彫刻勝村鐘造　摺松下葆 {chōkoku Katsumura Shōzō, suri Matsushita Shigeru}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Not a single nail was used in the construction of the 13 meter high stage of Kiyomizu Temple that was assembled in the batten structure (kakezukuri), known since about the 13th century.
title: Spring Snow, Kiyomizudera Temple in Kyoto
